EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower – The Most Powerful Solar: Web Inquiry Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi (Customer Name),
Thank you for interest in SunPower. Our goal is to find the right people for the right opportunities at the right time. Hiring top talent is critical to our success so we appreciate your inquiry.
SunPower Corporate HR only entertains online applications. With this, allow me to walk you through to SunPower website Career page.
Given below is the step by step guide that will help you find our Career page.
Step1: You should log on to (SunPower website (www.sunpowercorp.com) Step2: Select your Country Step3: Go to: About Us > Careers > Find a Position Step 4: Choose a Job Category and Location and click on Search. Results will show up.
Note: If you already have the job code you could just type it in the “key word search”
Step5: Click on the desired "Job Title" then click on "Apply" button.
Step6: Paste your cover letter and Upload your resume then click on "Continue".
For more information, please call our Customer Care line at 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) and I’ll be happy to assist you. You can also email your queries to customercare@sunpowercorp.com.
Thank you for your interest in SunPower and we wish you all the best in your career endeavors.
Regards,
Rae SunPower Customer Care Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER
